email.incomingsupport.body1.text: A customer has sent the following info

email.secret_link.link_works_once.text: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.

email.welcome.subject.text: Welcome to %{product_name} - Please verify your email

email.welcome.verify_prompt.text: Please verify your email address by clicking the link below:

email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.text: Or copy and paste this link:

email.welcome.postscript.text: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}. If you did not create an account, you can safely ignore this message.

email.password_request.request_notice.text: We received a request to reset your password for %{product_name}.

email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.text: Or copy and paste this link:

email.password_request.ignore_notice.text: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

email.password_request.postscript.text: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.

email.magic_link.request_notice.text: You requested a login link for your %{product_name} account.

email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.text: Or copy and paste this link:

email.magic_link.expiration_notice.text: This link will expire in 15 minutes.

email.magic_link.ignore_notice.text: If you did not request this link, you can safely ignore this email.

email.magic_link.postscript.text: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.

email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.text: Someone has sent you a secure message through %{display_domain}.

email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.text: To view this secret, click the link below:

email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.text: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.

email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.text: This is an automated notification. No action is required.

email.expiration_warning.subject.text: Your secret link will expire soon

email.expiration_warning.expires_in.text: Your secret link will expire in %{time_remaining}

email.expiration_warning.view_button.text: View your secret before it expires

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.text: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted.

email.organization_invitation.body.text: %{inviter_email} has invited you to join "%{organization_name}" as %{role_description}.

email.organization_invitation.link_instr.text: Or copy and paste this link:

email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.text: This invitation will expire in %{days} days.

email.organization_invitation.decline_in.text: If you don't want to join, you can simply ignore this email or decline the invitation.

email.organization_invitation.postscript.text: P.S. This email was sent to %{invited_email}. If you weren't expecting this invitation, you can safely ignore this message.

email.password_changed.body.text: Your password for %{product_name} was changed on %{date} at %{time}.

email.password_changed.security_notice.text: If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately by resetting your password and contacting support.

email.email_changed.body.text: The email address for your %{product_name} account was changed to %{new_email_masked} on %{date}.

email.email_changed.security_notice.text: If you did not make this change, please contact support immediately as your account may be compromised.

email.email_change_confirmation.body.text: Please verify this email address to complete the change for your %{product_name} account.

email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.text: Or copy and paste this link:

email.mfa_enabled.body.text: Two-factor authentication was enabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.

email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.text: Your account is now more secure. You will need to enter a verification code from your authenticator app when signing in.

email.mfa_disabled.body.text: Two-factor authentication was disabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.

email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.text: Your account is now less secure. If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately.

email.new_login_alert.body.text: A new sign-in to your %{product_name} account was detected on %{date} at %{time}.

email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.text: If this wasn't you, your account may be compromised.

email.member_removed.body.text: You have been removed from the organization "%{organization_name}" on %{product_name}.

email.role_changed.body.text: Your role in "%{organization_name}" has been changed from %{old_role} to %{new_role}.

email.organization_deleted.body.text: The organization "%{organization_name}" has been deleted from %{product_name}. All associated data has been removed.

email.payment_receipt.body.text: Thank you for your payment. Here are your payment details:

email.payment_failed.body.text: We were unable to process your payment for %{product_name}. Please update your payment method to avoid service interruption.

email.trial_expiring.body.text: Your free trial of %{product_name} will expire in %{days_remaining} days. Upgrade now to keep access to all features.

email.subscription_changed.body.text: Your %{product_name} subscription has been changed from %{old_plan} to %{new_plan}.
